attributes.action: Access to school toilets should be unconditional and they should no be locked
attributes.additional_details: I have children in high school that are not drinking due to the toilets being locked whilst lessons are happening they are becoming dehydrated because of this and school refuses a toilet pass unless a doctors note is obtained for an illness
attributes.background: Introduce a policy  for all schools that toilets should not be locked

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422
